title: MY ROSE

description.plain:
“​MY ROSE” is the fifth track from ​Beyoncé’s album “COWBOY CARTER”.

In this track, Beyoncé explores the complexity of love and expresses vulnerability. “MY ROSE” hugs flaws in yourself and in relationships.

With this song, Beyoncé invites listeners into a story that celebrates her Southern roots and contemporary style. The song is also dedicated to her son, Sir Carter; and from this perspective, Beyoncé wants her son to love himself, saying “So be fond of your flaws, dear” and “I just hope you love yourself like that”, reaffirming the desire for self-acceptance and love.

embed_content: Read “MY ROSE” by Beyoncé on Genius

body.plain:
“​MY ROSE” is the fifth track from ​Beyoncé’s album “COWBOY CARTER”.

In this track, Beyoncé explores the complexity of love and expresses vulnerability. “MY ROSE” hugs flaws in yourself and in relationships.

With this song, Beyoncé invites listeners into a story that celebrates her Southern roots and contemporary style. The song is also dedicated to her son, Sir Carter; and from this perspective, Beyoncé wants her son to love himself, saying “So be fond of your flaws, dear” and “I just hope you love yourself like that”, reaffirming the desire for self-acceptance and love.

lyrics:
35 ContributorsTranslationsPolskiNederlandsBahasa IndonesiaBeyoncé - MY ROSE (Traducción al Español)PortuguêsРусский (Russian)TürkçeMY ROSE Lyrics
How many times have you let yourself get you down?
Let yourself get you down, my dear?
So many roses but none to be picked without thorns
So be fond of your flaws, dear
La-la-la, la-la-la, love you
La-la-la, la-la-la, I love you
La-la-la, la-la-la, I just hope you love yourself like that
And I really hope the best for you
You're my love, my sweetie pie
My baby, you're my heart
I hope
Oh, I hope
